name: geneva
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the western part of Switzerland: The Geneva meeting will bring together the five permanent members of the United Nations Security Council. In Geneva you could stay at the Grand Hotel Kempinski, which has great views of the lake.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Geneva the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Geneva.He attended school in Geneva and speaks French.Geneva, Paris, London and New York are among the top international centres for dispute resolution.
